arts.ttl: 'Time to think' - Pep Guardiola talks Man City rebuild after Real Madrid exit
arts.sum: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola needs his players to achieve a new target before the end of the season as they fight for their futures

arts.ttl: One Man City summer exit might have been decided in Madrid with Pep Guardiola's double snub
arts.sum: The moments you might have missed as Manchester City took on Real Madrid in their Champions League knockout play-off second leg.
